newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Cenbank bond rate slides to 2.5939 pct.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Cenbank bond rate slides to 2.5939 pct.

text.p: Brazil's benchmark overnight rate slid to 2.5939 percent a month from 2.6015 percent last week at today's 7.251 billion reais sale of 56-day Central Bank Bonds (BBC), dealers said.
The auction's result was in line with market expectations, they added.
The 56-day bonds will mature on November 13. Today's auction is expected to add 1.249 billion reais to the banking system, with 8.5 billion reais in old bonds coming due Wednesday.
